name: V2 HELICOPTERS PTY LTD
about: V2 Helicopters, established in 2009, is a premier helicopter flight training and services company based in Brisbane, Australia. Located at Archerfield airport, just 15 minutes from the Brisbane CBD, we offer exceptional helicopter pilot training for private and commercial licenses. Our team of highly experienced and friendly instructors provides personalized training, including helicopter theory tuition, aircraft endorsements, night ratings, and specialized courses like mustering and sling endorsements. We also offer scenic tours, executive charters, winery tours, and aerial photography services across Southeast Queensland. With a strong commitment to safety and customer service, V2 Helicopters has grown into a leading helicopter company, fostering a deep understanding of aviation and creating competent pilots. Join us for an unforgettable flying experience and discover the freedom of flight with V2 Helicopters.
services: ["Commercial Helicopter Pilot License\nPrivate Pilot License\nAircraft Endorsements and Ratings"]
